live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 11:45 AM. Please stay tuned for updates.
37260.summary: Some customers in the Downtown area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37260.title: May 12 – Edmonton (Downtown) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
